Sit or lie down comfortably. As you breathe in, say to yourself *'I am calm.'* As you exhale, say *'I let go.'* Repeat for a few breaths.
Imagine you are on a quiet beach. With every inhale, hear the gentle waves. With every exhale, feel your stress wash away.
